definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages

sentences.english: Being responsible for answering the Stewarding phone and assisting all operations with requirements.
sentences.chinese: 負責接聽管事部的電話，協助執行所有要求。

sentences.english: Sightseeing and receiving of telephone call will be allowed outside the gymnastic room.
sentences.chinese: 請於本室室外參觀團體操課程或接聽手提電話。

sentences.english: Its employees have now gone quiet. Its corporate Website is down and nobody answers the phones.
sentences.chinese: 目前該公司的網站已經關閉，公司也沒有人接聽電話。

sentences.english: When you answer the phone, be warm and enthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 接聽電話時，應該誠摯而熱情。

sentences.english: Zhenyuan county government did not answer calls today.
sentences.chinese: 今天鎮遠縣政府沒有人接聽電話。

sentences.english: When the destination party picks up the call, the second leg begins.
sentences.chinese: 當目標方接聽電話時，第二檔就開始了。

sentences.english: This technique creates a strong reference from the event source to the event listener.
sentences.chinese: 這個技術會建立事件來源對事件接聽項的強式參考。

sentences.english: WuYanBin contact instrument elim mother but nobody answered the phone.
sentences.chinese: 吳彥斌聯繫儀琳的媽媽卻沒有人接聽電話。

sentences.english: If the door bell or telephone rings, ignore it or take the baby with you to answer it.
sentences.chinese: 如果門鈴或者電話鈴響，不應理採它或讓寶寶去接聽。

sentences.english: Once I got voicemail. But usually it rings off the hook.
sentences.chinese: 有一次我接通了語音信箱，但是通常電話都無人接聽。

sentences.english: In the Ministry of justice has no one to answer the phone.
sentences.chinese: 中糧集團法務部的電話一直無人接聽。

sentences.english: Do not jump to answer any unscheduled phone call or respond to any other interruption.
sentences.chinese: 不要隨意接聽沒預約的電話或受其他事情的干擾。

sentences.english: He thinks clicking the answering key.
Repeated calls to the propaganda department went unanswered on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 週二，記者曾多次致電醫院宣傳部門，均無人接聽。

sentences.english: We will answer your phone immediately!
sentences.chinese: 機主馬上接聽您的電話。

sentences.english: You can use an answerphone to screen your phone calls before you answer them.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用電話答錄機在接聽電話之前來檢查這些來電。

definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)
